scope.data

Class SQLController

  • java.lang.Object
    • scope.data.SQLController

  • public class SQLController
extends Object
    Controls the data flow between GUIClass and SQLQuerier
    Author:
    Philipp

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Configuration config
      The loaded config file that is used for all database communication
      static int dataListIndex
      Jumps between 1 and 2, so that readFromTimestamp writes to dataListOne or dataListTwo
      static ArrayList<double[]> dataListOne
      List containting double arrays that contain the data
      static ArrayList<double[]> dataListThree
      List containting double arrays that contain the data
      static ArrayList<double[]> dataListTwo
      List containting double arrays that contain the data
      static String dbtable
      The database table from which SQLQuerier reads
      static boolean getNewTimestampFlag
      Flag that indicates if the lastResultsetTimestamp can be updated
      static boolean hasActiveThread
      Flag that keeps track if there is an active Thread.
      static Timestamp lastResultsetTimestamp
      The timestamp of the last row from the last used ResultSet
      static int limit
      The size of the ResultSet
      static int listIndex
      The index of the currently used dataList
      static int readIndex
      The index that keeps track of SQL queries

        public static ArrayList<double[]> dataListThree
        List containting double arrays that contain the data

      • dataListIndex

        public static int dataListIndex
        Jumps between 1 and 2, so that readFromTimestamp writes to dataListOne or dataListTwo

      • getNewTimestampFlag

        public static boolean getNewTimestampFlag
        Flag that indicates if the lastResultsetTimestamp can be updated

      • dbtable

        public static String dbtable
        The database table from which SQLQuerier reads

        public static Configuration config
        The loaded config file that is used for all database communication

        public static int limit
        The size of the ResultSet

      • readIndex

        public static int readIndex
        The index that keeps track of SQL queries

      • lastResultsetTimestamp

        public static Timestamp lastResultsetTimestamp
        The timestamp of the last row from the last used ResultSet

      • listIndex

        public static int listIndex
        The index of the currently used dataList

      • hasActiveThread

        public static boolean hasActiveThread
        Flag that keeps track if there is an active Thread. If there is, no new readFromTimestamp will be called.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SQLController

        public SQLController()

    • Method Detail

      • readFromTimestamp

        public static void readFromTimestamp(Timestamp timestamp)
        Creates a new SQLQuerier Thread, which queries the database. Timestamp is the last timestamp of the last ResultSet.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - the timestamp that will be used in the SQL query

      • initializeDatabaseConnection

        public static void initializeDatabaseConnection(Timestamp timestamp,
                                Configuration config)
        Sets the config and initializes the SQL thread dataListProperty changes as soon as it changes in the SQLQuerier thread. This way, as soon as the SQL query is finished, the result is returned and stored in the currently unused dataList, indicated by the dataListIndex Differentiates between 'live' and 'all' mode, which displays live inserted data or everything in the database
        Parameters:
        timestamp - the timestamp that will be used in the SQL query
        config - the config file that will be used for all future database communication
